title:
Lipschitz regularity for solutions to an orthotropic $q$-Laplacian-type
  equation in the Heisenberg group
authors: Michele Circelli, Giovanna Citti and Albert Clop
abstract:
We prove the local Lipschitz regularity for solutions to an orthotropic $q$
Laplacian-type equation in the Heisenberg group. The technique we apply is
largely inspired by the works of X. Zhong, where the $q$-Laplacian was studied
in the Heinsenberg group and the H\"older regularity of gradient was proved.
Due to the degeneracy of the present equation, this regularity of the gradient
is not even known in the Euclidean setting, and only its boundedness is
expected.
